TL;DR

Hi there, thanks for stopping by. My name is Jimmy Dempsey, I am a highly strategic, inventive and creative problem solver eager to produce excellent work in development and creation of brand, marketing and user experience.

Click here to view my resume.

About Me

I am a 25 year old User Interface Developer from Fairfax, VA based in Orlando, FL.

I work as a UX/UI developer and Web Performance Lead for Cru, one of the largest non-profit organizations in the United States, at their headquarters in Florida.

I specialize in writing personalized code for websites and web apps, with a focus on CSS, HTML, Javascript for creating powerful web solutions. I love interacting with many different web technologies. Currently I am playing with Ruby, Jekyll and SASS Mixins.

Contact

If you would like to chat feel free to send me an email. It is my goal to respond to every email I receive, but if it takes me a while to respond don't hesitate to follow up.

I am currently accepting freelance work on a case-by-case basis.
